content: United Nations Security Council resolutionUnited Nations resolution adopted in 1965 **[United Nations](/wiki/United_Nations) [Security Council Resolution](/wiki/United_Nations_Security_Council_Resolution) 213** was adopted unanimously on September 20, 1965. It was done after examining the application of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) for [membership in the United Nations](/wiki/Enlargement_of_the_United_Nations). The Council recommended to the [General Assembly](/wiki/United_Nations_General_Assembly) that Singapore be admitted. - [List of United Nations Security Council Resolutions 201 to 300](/wiki/List_of_United_Nations_Security_Council_Resolutions_201_to_300) (1965â€“1971) - Text of the Resolution at undocs.org - Works related to United Nations Security Council Resolution 213 at Wikisource
title: United Nations Security Council Resolution 213
